name: The Last Wave
description:
The last wave is a round-based FPS survival game. 

You can fight against 4 different enemies, switch between 5 types of weapons, which can be upgrades over 25 times. In addition you can get power ups and player upgrades. There are over 200 rounds, but how long will you survive ? 

Discover the world, fight the monsters and try to stay alive.

Made by:

Marius Höfler, Ilyes Ben Dlala, Ricardo Cincato
